title: This is an excellnt base to use for a holiday; near to public transport, airport, Hotel with that International attitude
text: Please read previous page. It's all there: The place, attitude of the staff, quality, professionalism, availability and much, much more and not forgetting EL Rancho Inn is part of Best Western and we have used best Western many times in Europe and have never yet been disappointed.
